Definition.WordDefinition: striptease n 1: a performer who provides erotic entertainment by undressing to music [syn: {stripper}, {striptease artist}, {stripteaser}, {exotic dancer}, {ecdysiast}, {peeler}] 2: a form of erotic entertainment in which a dancer gradually undresses to music; "she did a strip right in front of everyone" [syn: {strip}, {strip show}]
